01-05.description: A settlement without a publicly enforced government or authority.

06-11.description: One hereditary ruler weilds absolute power over this settlement.

12-14.description: The important settlement decisions are made by elected officials.

15-19.description: Each settlement in a confederacy governs itself, but contribute to each other.

20-22.description: Elected officials determine the laws in this settlement.

23-27.description: One supreme ruler weilds absolute authority.

28-38.description: Local lords rule their own territory, but all answer to a reigning lord.

39-41.description: The elders of the settlement make all of the decisions.

42-47.description: A feudal government where every member, except one, is subordinate to another.

52-54.description: The settlement is governed by the eldest or most important female.

55-59.description: Military leaders run the settlement under martial law using armed forces.

60-69.description: The most common fantasy world government. Settlement ruled by a king/queen.

70-72.description: Governed by the wisest people or person in the settlement.

73-76.description: Power is held by a select few powerful, wealthy people. Often tyrannical.

77-79.description: The settlement is governed by the eldest or most important male.

80-82.description: The most intelligent and educated people oversee the settlement.

83-84.description: The settlement is ruled by the rich. They band together and make the decisions.

85-92.description: The citizens select representatives who make all the decisions.

93-94.description: Conquerors from another government rule this settlement.

95-96.description: Ruled by an individual who is only seeking wealth for themselves.

97-100.description: Ruled by direct representatives of an almighty deity.
